headline: PYPL's Transaction Revenues: Will it Pave the Way or Hinder Growth?
summary: PayPal's Q4 transaction revenues rise 3% to $7.82B, but a lower transaction take rate and a flat 2026 TM$ outlook cloud its growth trajectory.

headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Maintains Overweight on Block, Lowers Price Target to $70
summary: Cantor Fitzgerald  analyst Ramsey El-Assal   maintains Block (NYSE:XYZ) with a Overweight and lowers the price target from $87 to $70.

headline: Toast Has Strong Fundamentals, But A Weak Moat
summary: Toast will face pricing power limitations in the future due to intense competition from Block, Fiserv, and legacy processors. Read why TOST stock is a Sell.

headline: Jack Dorsey Backed Cash App Rolls Out Zero-Fee Bitcoin Payments
summary: Cash App, the popular mobile payments platform from Block, has unveiled a sweeping overhaul of its Bitcoin fee structure and withdrawal policies.
